recipe.title: Greek Nachos
ingredients: 2 small persian cucumbers, seeded and diced
instructions: 1. Place the pita chips on a serving platter. 2. Top with the red bell pepper, tomatoes, olives, and cheese. 3. In a small bowl, stir together the yogurt, cucumbers, lemon juice, and salt. Drizzle all over the nachos.
